properties.description: This is the Main pipeline which will contain sub pipelines

activities.name: Execute Pipeline Master Staging
activities.description: This pipeline will run the pipelines to execute the data flows for Staging

activities.name: Execute Pipeline Master Dimensions
activities.description: This pipeline will run the pipelines to execute the data flows for the Dimensions

activities.name: Execute Pipeline Master Facts
activities.description: This pipeline will run the pipelines to execute the data flows for the Facts

body.value:
{
    "title": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Staging').output.pipelineName} SUCCEEDED!",
    "message": "Pipeline run finished successfully!",
    "color": "Green",
    "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "pipelineName": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Staging').output.pipelineName}",
    "pipelineRunId": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Staging').output.pipelineRunId}",
    "time": "@{utcnow()}"
}

{
    "title": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Staging').output.pipelineName} FAILED!",
    "message": "Error: @{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Staging').error.message}",
    "color": "Red",
    "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "pipelineName": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Staging').output.pipelineName}",
    "pipelineRunId": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Staging').output.pipelineRunId}",
    "time": "@{utcnow()}"
    }

{
    "title": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Dimensions').output.pipelineName} FAILED!",
    "message": "Error: @{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Dimensions').error.message}",
    "color": "Red",
    "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "pipelineName": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Dimensions').output.pipelineName}",
    "pipelineRunId": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Dimensions').output.pipelineRunId}",
    "time": "@{utcnow()}"
    }

{
    "title": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Facts').output.pipelineName} FAILED!",
    "message": "Error: @{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Facts').error.message}",
    "color": "Red",
    "dataFactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "pipelineName": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Facts').output.pipelineName}",
    "pipelineRunId": "@{activity('Execute Pipeline Master Facts').output.pipelineRunId}",
    "time": "@{utcnow()}"
    }
